**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**Retrieve the logs (Chrome)**
1. Open the extension
2. Right click in it and click Inspect
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/427b4ebb-165a-4acd-b920-5b2dfc6066db)
3. A new window will appear, click on the 'Console' tab
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/860eff82-5fd7-4b09-8e9c-243a671492f7)
4. On the right side there'll be a dropdown, click it and make sure all the levels are selected
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/321dcd3e-b892-4406-9f2a-f434ae4bb468)
5. Right click in the window and click 'Save as...', then upload that .log file here
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0f8aba01-d149-4a4b-a931-bcc4777e9688)

Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
